title: Add Enter key navigation from Fat to SNF field

requirements.text: Enable Enter key press on the Fat input field to move focus to the SNF input field in the milk collection form

quotes: Also use enter key to move from fat to SNF/save

acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter while focused on the Fat field moves focus to the SNF field
The navigation works consistently with existing Enter key patterns in the form

constraints: Maintain existing Enter key navigation patterns from Farmer ID to Quantity and Quantity to Fat
Do not modify the Save button trigger behavior on Enter from SNF field
nonGoals: Changing the existing keyboard navigation from Farmer ID to Quantity
Changing the existing keyboard navigation from Quantity to Fat
